description:
Description


Dr. Althea’s To Be Youthful Eye Serum is a one-step solution for protecting the skin around
the eyes, also known as the thinnest skin of the entire body. It is a serum that reduces and
prevents wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes by delivering moisture deep down to the
skin, while also preventing nutrient loss and promoting water retention. Hypoallergenic
and suitable for all skin types.

Wrinkles form because skin cells begin to deteriorate over time. This means cell metabolism and cell regeneration become slower gradually, causing the skin to start sagging. In order to combat this, the To Be Youthful Eye Serum can be used to reduce fine lines or even prevent it. Adenosine and Tocopherol, which are ingredients in the serum,
help revitalize sagging skin. In addition, it delivers hydration and nutrients down the dermis. This helps regenerate skin cells and produce a beautiful glow. 

Since the skin around the eyes is very delicate, the skin is prone to dryness and wrinkles. The To Be Youthful Eye Serum has been formulated as a non-sticky, concentrated gel. To apply, pat the gel around your eyes to promote fast absorption into the skin. The tube has been designed to minimize exposure to the air, in order to prevent oxidization.

reviews.content:
I’ve been using the TIRTIR Eye Cream for a while now, and I’m genuinely impressed with the results. The texture is lightweight yet rich enough to provide deep hydration without feeling greasy or heavy under the eyes. It absorbs quickly, making it perfect for both morning and nighttime use.

The packaging is also sleek and hygienic, and a little goes a long way, so the tube lasts quite a while. Overall, this eye cream has become a staple in my skincare routine. I’d definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective solution for tired or aging under-eyes.

The Tranexamic Acid + Glutathione Eye Cream is a brightening eye cream designed to target dark circles, fine lines, and wrinkles, revitalizing the delicate skin around the eyes. Clinically proven to improve skin texture, dark circles, and fine lines within two weeks of use, this eye cream combines the powerful effects of Tranexamic acid, which inhibits melanin production and reduces pigmentation. Its excellent safety and stability make it effective in blocking melanin formation and eliminating activated oxygen that causes skin discoloration and wrinkles. Additionally, the cream contains Glutathione, Niacinamide, and Vitamin C, which work together to brighten the skin and prevent the formation of fine lines.Formulated without harmful ingredients such as parabens, ethanol, mineral oil, phenoxyethanol, synthetic dyes, and allergenic substances, this eye cream is also cruelty-free and has not been tested on animals. Dermatologically tested for skin irritation, it ensures safety for sensitive skin, allowing worry-free use. The Tranexamic Acid + Glutathione Eye Cream provides a targeted solution for brightening and improving the eye area, making it a safe and effective addition to any skincare routine.
Suggested Use
